message: Let's start fair. I'll take most of the money now, but you can have a chance to make a better deal in the next round.
Let's split it in a way that I think is more fair, considering I'm taking on the risk of inflation.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a good portion of the money.  Let's meet in the middle.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more than half since the value of my share is decreasing over time.
I'm willing to meet you halfway on your last offer, but I need to get closer to 6000 to make this worthwhile for me. Let's avoid reaching a point where both of us get nothing.
